game_description: Gamerz Lab is a multi-activity, sci-fi themed playground designed to give the users a holistic gaming experience like never before. There are two separate zones. The Game Zone offers a virtual game booth featuring a wave based shooting game. Over time more and more game booths will be added, each with exciting new games. With every new game Gamerz Lab will become a completely new experience to explore! Whenever you want to take a break from Game Zone you can move over to the Relax Zone and chill out. With amazing visuals and micro-activity corners like boxing corner and many more to come with every update will make the Gamerz Lab an unforgettable gaming experience for gamers. Relax in the lobby or use the boxing corner to release your inner Mike Tyson. Game booths offering different experiences (Shooters etc) Breathtaking visuals and amazing gameplay.
review_1: This game is very fun although it it still in, what I can believe to be, early development. If there was some more variety to the relax zone, maybe having alternate spaces would bring more depth to the game. Have a couple more minigames is a must, the more variety the longer users will play the game. Great vr games, although most are short, have much variety. Just some thoughts I thought I should share, good luck in development.
review_2: Some kinda mini social games hub, and seems quite posh. I forgot what game I played but it was all very colorful and nice.
review_3: At the moment, there is only one minigame that you can play. It’s a fun game but it does get repetitive after a while. I like dual wielding to shoot the pink balls. It’s not exactly challenging, though. I’m honestly not sure if there is a way to “lose”, the game seems to go on forever with virtually no way to fail.
